_README:
Abandoned Research Facility: Escape Protocol Alpha
All names case-insensitive. Commands: go DIR, take ITEM, use ITEM on TARGET, examine ITEM, inv, save, load, quit.
Win by reaching 'Surface Lab'.

items.name: Sledgehammer
items.description: Heavy industrial hammer for breaking weak structures.

usability.effectDescription: CRASH! The wall shatters, revealing rubble and a new path south.

items.name: Rubble
items.description: Collapsed stone blocking the south passage.

items.name: Key Card
items.description: Level 3 security card for control doors.

items.name: Crank
items.description: Rusty mechanical crank for valve mechanisms.

usability.effectDescription: You turn the crank. Gears grind, and the north door unlocks with a hiss.

items.name: Weak Wall
items.description: Cracked concrete section in the Maintenance Tunnel.

items.name: Maintenance Log
items.description: 'Control Room requires Key Card AND crank signal. Power reroute via Chemical Lab.'

items.name: Crank Socket
items.description: Empty hexagonal socket in the workshop wall.

items.name: Battery
items.description: High-voltage power cell, drained but salvageable.

usability.effectDescription: Sparks fly! Power restored. A code note ejects: 'Elevator: ACID42'.

items.name: Power Panel
items.description: Flickering electrical panel. Needs power source.

usability.effectDescription: The acid eats through the lock. Elevator Key drops out!

items.name: Rusted Door
items.description: Corroded metal door blocking elevator access.

usability.effectDescription: Elevator activates! Doors open to Surface Lab.

rooms.name: Cryo Chamber
rooms.description: Frozen pods line the walls. Emergency lights flash. East to Boiler Room, West locked.

rooms.name: Rusty Boiler Room
rooms.description: Rusted machinery hums faintly. North tunnel visible.

rooms.name: Maintenance Tunnel
rooms.description: Narrow, dripping corridor. Weak Wall south, Guard Post north.

rooms.name: Guard Post
rooms.description: Desk with open log. East to Corridor.

rooms.name: East Corridor
rooms.description: Bright hall. North: Control Room (locked). South blocked. West: Guard Post.

conditions.failMessage: Dual auth required: Key Card AND crank signal.

rooms.name: Control Room
rooms.description: Consoles flicker. 'Power reroute failed. Check Chemical Lab.' South back.

rooms.name: South Passage
rooms.description: Twisting vent. South to Workshop, North Corridor.

rooms.name: Old Workshop
rooms.description: Tools scattered. Crank Socket in wall.

rooms.name: Chemical Lab
rooms.description: Vials and fume hoods. East locked (Rusted Door).
